articles.title: About Me
articles.contents: I’m a high school science teacher and a PhD student in educational psychology studying visuals and representations for learning. I’m interested in educational technology, cognitive science, learning analytics, and STEM education.

articles.title: Kaleb Mathieu

Kaleb Mathieu

            Kaleb Mathieu
          
          
            
              
              About
              I’m a PhD student in educational psychology and a high school science teacher. My current research explores the use of representations for learning chemistry.
              
              
              Research interests
              Educational technology | STEM education | Learning sciences
              Cognitive science | R | Data science | Statistics
